levelName: 英文單字認讀基礎級(四)

examples.english: My uncle was a good cook at that restaurant.
examples.chinese: 我的舅舅在那間餐廳是個好廚師。

examples.english: Mom cooked a delicious meal for our family last night.
examples.chinese: 媽媽昨晚為我們的家人煮了一頓美味的餐點。

examples.english: My little brother cooked his first egg yesterday morning.
examples.chinese: 我的小弟弟昨天早上煮了他的第一顆蛋。

examples.english: The taxi driver took us home after school.
examples.chinese: 計程車司機放學後載我們回家。

examples.english: The bus driver stopped the car at the station.
examples.chinese: 公車司機在車站停了車。

examples.english: My uncle is a careful driver on the road.
examples.chinese: 我的叔叔在路上是個很小心的駕駛員。

examples.english: My dad is an engineer, he designed the new park.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸是工程師，他設計了新的公園。

examples.english: The engineer built a strong robot for the contest.
examples.chinese: 那位工程師為比賽建造了一台堅固的機器人。

examples.english: An engineer made sure the big bridge was very safe.
examples.chinese: 一位工程師確保這座大橋非常安全。

examples.english: My grandpa was a farmer; he grew sweet potatoes.
examples.chinese: 我的爺爺是個農夫；他種地瓜。

examples.english: A kind farmer gave us some fresh apples yesterday.
examples.chinese: 一位好心的農夫昨天給了我們一些新鮮蘋果。

examples.english: Farmers help us get delicious food every day.
examples.chinese: 農夫每天幫助我們取得美味的食物。

examples.english: A worker helped us carry the heavy box.
examples.chinese: 一位工人幫我們搬了很重的箱子。

examples.english: Many workers worked hard in the factory.
examples.chinese: 很多工人在工廠裡努力工作。

examples.english: The worker wore a yellow safety helmet.
examples.chinese: 那位工人戴著黃色的安全帽。

examples.english: He wrote his name on the card yesterday.
examples.chinese: 他昨天把他的名字寫在卡片上。

examples.english: My parents named me Lily when I was born.
examples.chinese: 我出生時，爸媽給我取名叫莉莉。

examples.english: The girl could not name all the fruits.
examples.chinese: 那個女孩說不出所有的水果名稱。

examples.english: Mr. Lin taught us art class yesterday.
examples.chinese: 林先生昨天教我們美術課。

examples.english: We saw Mr. Chen buying fruit at the market.
examples.chinese: 我們在市場看到陳先生買水果。

examples.english: My mom talked to Mr. Wang about the new park.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽和王先生聊了新公園的事。

examples.english: Mrs. Chen kindly gave me a cookie yesterday.
examples.chinese: 陳太太昨天很和善地給我一個餅乾。

examples.english: My mom met Mrs. Lee at the park.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽在公園遇見了李太太。

examples.english: We saw Mrs. Chang at the market this morning.
examples.chinese: 我們今天早上在市場看到張太太了。

examples.english: Eating fresh fruit every day is good for our health.
examples.chinese: 每天吃新鮮水果對我們的健康很好。

examples.english: Yesterday, my dad bought some tasty fruit from the store.
examples.chinese: 昨天，我爸爸從商店買了一些好吃的水果。

examples.english: For lunch, I shared a big piece of fruit with my friend.
examples.chinese: 午餐時，我跟我的朋友分享了一大塊水果。

examples.english: I ate a delicious apple after school yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天放學後吃了一個美味的蘋果。

examples.english: My mom bought two big red apples at the market.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽在市場買了兩個大紅色的蘋果。

examples.english: We picked many apples from the apple tree last week.
examples.chinese: 我們上週從蘋果樹上摘了許多蘋果。

examples.english: I ate a sweet pear yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天吃了一個甜甜的梨子。

examples.english: My mom bought a big green pear.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽買了一個大大的綠梨子。

examples.english: We saw many pears at the market.
examples.chinese: 我們在市場看到很多梨子。

examples.english: I ate a sweet and juicy peach yesterday afternoon.
examples.chinese: 我昨天下午吃了一個又甜又多汁的桃子。

examples.english: Her favorite shirt was a light peach color.
examples.chinese: 她最喜歡的襯衫是淺桃色的。

examples.english: My family picked many fresh peaches at the farm.
examples.chinese: 我家在農場採了許多新鮮的桃子。

examples.english: My mom bought some sweet grapes for me.
examples.chinese: 我的媽媽幫我買了一些甜葡萄。

examples.english: Many grapes are purple, but some are green.
examples.chinese: 很多葡萄是紫色的，但有些是綠色的。

examples.english: We picked many grapes at the farm last week.
examples.chinese: 我們上週在農場摘了很多葡萄。

examples.english: We ate a sweet banana after lunch.
examples.chinese: 我們午餐後吃了一根甜香蕉。

examples.english: The monkey liked the yellow banana very much.
examples.chinese: 那隻猴子非常喜歡那根黃色的香蕉。

examples.english: Dad put a banana in my lunchbox this morning.
examples.chinese: 爸爸今天早上在我的午餐盒裡放了一根香蕉。

examples.english: He drank a lot of water after playing outside.
examples.chinese: 他在外面玩之後喝了很多水。

examples.english: My mother watered the flowers in the garden yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽昨天在花園裡澆花了。

examples.english: The fish swim in the clean river water.
examples.chinese: 魚兒在乾淨的河水裡游泳。

examples.english: I drank a glass of milk for breakfast.
examples.chinese: 我早餐喝了一杯牛奶。

examples.english: She put some milk in her cereal this morning.
examples.chinese: 她今天早上在麥片裡加了牛奶。

examples.english: My mom bought a carton of milk yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽昨天買了一盒牛奶。

examples.english: He had a cold Coke with his burger.
examples.chinese: 他吃漢堡時喝了一杯冰可樂。

examples.english: My mom bought a bottle of Coke for me.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽幫我買了一瓶可樂。

examples.english: I like to drink cold Coke in summer.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡在夏天喝冰可樂。

examples.english: I drank a glass of orange juice this morning.
examples.chinese: 我今天早上喝了一杯柳橙汁。

examples.english: My mom bought some apple juice for my snack.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽買了一些蘋果汁給我當點心。

examples.english: This sweet fruit juice is good for breakfast.
examples.chinese: 這甜甜的果汁很適合當早餐。

examples.english: My dad drank hot coffee with milk this morning.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸今天早上喝了熱咖啡加牛奶。

examples.english: Mom bought a small coffee from the store yesterday.
examples.chinese: 媽媽昨天從商店買了一小杯咖啡。

examples.english: My sister ate coffee ice cream after dinner last night.
examples.chinese: 我姐姐昨晚晚餐後吃了咖啡冰淇淋。

examples.english: My mom made a cup of tea for me yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽昨天為我泡了一杯茶。

examples.english: My friend gave me some black tea last week.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友上週給了我一些紅茶。

examples.english: The hot tea warmed my hands in winter.
examples.chinese: 熱茶在冬天溫暖了我的手。

examples.english: My mom cooked a delicious egg for my breakfast.
examples.chinese: 我的媽媽為我的早餐煮了一顆美味的蛋。

examples.english: The little bird laid an egg in its nest yesterday.
examples.chinese: 那隻小鳥昨天在牠的巢裡下了一顆蛋。

examples.english: We need three eggs to bake this yummy cake.
examples.chinese: 我們需要三顆蛋來烤這個美味的蛋糕。

examples.english: She loved the sweet strawberry cake very much.
examples.chinese: 她非常喜歡那個甜草莓蛋糕。

examples.english: Mom made a yummy cake for my birthday.
examples.chinese: 媽媽為我的生日做了一個美味的蛋糕。

examples.english: That big cake had many colorful candles on it.
examples.chinese: 那個大蛋糕上面有許多彩色蠟燭。

examples.english: I saw a colorful fish in the aquarium yesterday.
examples.chinese: 昨天我在水族箱裡看到一條很漂亮的魚。

examples.english: We ate delicious grilled fish for dinner last night.
examples.chinese: 昨晚我們晚餐吃了美味的烤魚。

examples.english: My grandpa taught me how to fish by the lake.
examples.chinese: 我爺爺教我在湖邊釣魚。

examples.english: My mom bought a big bag of rice yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽昨天買了一大袋米。

examples.english: We ate a lot of rice for dinner last night.
examples.chinese: 我們昨晚晚餐吃了很多米飯。

examples.english: My dad cooked rice for us this morning.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸今天早上為我們煮了米飯。

examples.english: I ate a very big breakfast yesterday morning.
examples.chinese: 我昨天早上吃了一頓非常豐盛的早餐。

examples.english: Yesterday, my friend and I had breakfast at home.
examples.chinese: 昨天，我和我的朋友在家吃早餐。

examples.english: I drank milk with my breakfast this morning.
examples.chinese: 我今天早上喝牛奶配早餐。

examples.english: We ate our lunch together at school.
examples.chinese: 我們在學校一起吃了午餐。

examples.english: My lunch was a sandwich and an apple.
examples.chinese: 我的午餐是一個三明治和一顆蘋果。

examples.english: The bell rang for lunch.
examples.chinese: 鐘聲響了，代表午餐時間到了。

examples.english: We ate pizza for dinner last night.
examples.chinese: 我們昨晚晚餐吃了披薩。

examples.english: I had a nice dinner with my family yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天和家人吃了一頓很棒的晚餐。

examples.english: Mom always makes delicious dinner for us.
examples.chinese: 媽媽總是為我們做美味的晚餐。

examples.english: I drink water every day to stay healthy.
examples.chinese: 我每天喝水來保持健康。

examples.english: Yesterday, my brother drank all the orange juice.
examples.chinese: 昨天，我弟弟喝光了所有的柳橙汁。

examples.english: After playing, I like to have a cold drink.
examples.chinese: 玩耍後，我喜歡喝一杯冰涼的飲料。

examples.english: I ate breakfast this morning before school.
examples.chinese: 我今天早上上學前吃了早餐。

examples.english: My brother ate a big hamburger for dinner last night.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥昨晚晚餐吃了一個大漢堡。

examples.english: We ate many yummy fruits with our friends yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天和朋友一起吃了許多美味的水果。

examples.english: My cat loves to sleep on my soft blanket.
我的貓喜歡睡在我的軟毯子上。
Yesterday, I slept very well because I was tired.
昨天，我睡得很好因為我很累。
Please go to sleep early tonight, you have school tomorrow.
今晚請早點睡覺，你明天要上學。
Yesterday, I read a fun story in my new book.
examples.chinese: 昨天，我在我的新書裡讀了一個有趣的故事。

examples.english: My dad read the newspaper after dinner last night.
examples.chinese: 我的爸爸昨晚吃完晚餐後讀了報紙。

examples.english: My teacher read a picture book to the class this morning.
examples.chinese: 今天早上，我的老師讀了一本繪本給全班聽。

examples.english: I played basketball with my friends yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天和我的朋友們玩籃球。

examples.english: She played with her new toy car.
examples.chinese: 她玩她的新玩具車。

examples.english: The children played happily in the park this morning.
examples.chinese: 今天早上孩子們在公園裡快樂地玩耍。

examples.english: We went to the park to play with friends yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天去公園和朋友玩。

examples.english: She went to a fun birthday party last Saturday.
examples.chinese: 她上週六去了一個有趣的生日派對。

examples.english: My brother went to bed very late last night.
examples.chinese: 我弟弟昨天晚上很晚才去睡覺。

examples.english: I liked to eat yummy ice cream yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天喜歡吃美味的冰淇淋。

examples.english: He liked to play basketball with friends last week.
examples.chinese: 他上週喜歡和朋友一起打籃球。

examples.english: My mom liked blue flowers very much before.
examples.chinese: 我的媽媽以前非常喜歡藍色的花。

examples.english: We like to listen to pop music in the classroom.
examples.chinese: 我們喜歡在教室裡聽流行音樂。

examples.english: You must listen to your mom and dad.
examples.chinese: 你必須聽你爸爸媽媽的話。

examples.english: She listened for the rain outside yesterday.
examples.chinese: 她昨天在外面聽雨聲。

examples.english: We enjoyed the music at the party last night.
examples.chinese: 我們昨晚在派對上很喜歡那些音樂。

examples.english: The music from the band was very loud.
examples.chinese: 樂隊的音樂非常大聲。

examples.english: We sang many songs in music class yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天在音樂課上唱了很多歌。

examples.english: We watched a very fun movie last night.
examples.chinese: 我們昨晚看了一部很有趣的電影。

examples.english: My family went to the movie theater on Saturday.
examples.chinese: 我家人週六去了電影院。

examples.english: That new cartoon movie was really exciting to watch.
examples.chinese: 那部新的卡通電影看得很刺激。

examples.english: Yesterday, I read a very funny comic book.
examples.chinese: 昨天我讀了一本非常有趣的漫畫書。

examples.english: My friend has many comic books about superheroes.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友有很多關於超級英雄的漫畫書。

examples.english: She bought a new comic book from the store.
examples.chinese: 她從商店買了一本新的漫畫書。

examples.english: I played a fun game on the computer yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天在電腦上玩了一個有趣的遊戲。

examples.english: We use computers to learn many new things.
examples.chinese: 我們使用電腦學習許多新事物。

examples.english: My family bought a new computer last month.
examples.chinese: 我的家人上個月買了一台新電腦。

examples.english: I took the bus to school yesterday morning.
examples.chinese: 我昨天早上搭公車去學校。

examples.english: We waited for the bus at the stop.
examples.chinese: 我們在公車站牌等公車。

examples.english: Look! A big red bus just passed by.
examples.chinese: 看！一輛大紅色公車剛剛開過去了。
